resources.string:
About
-----------
With the help of Foodie, you can read Chinese menu and learn about Chinese cuisine by just taking a picture of the foodâ€™s name. You can also mark tasty foods for the convenience to order next time. 

Guidline
----------------
+ Make sure your phone is connected with the Internet.

 + Click on Search button.

+ Put the dish name in the blue box shown on your screen and take a picture.
All food pictures are from Meishij.net

Tips


+ Make sure the whole name is in the box.

 + Make sure your hands did not shake when taking the picture.
